mapper.update: merge into aid_patient_xt a using (select #{xtSeq, jdbcType = VARCHAR} xt_seq, #{bqpg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bqpg, #{scyljc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} scyljc, #{wlyyry,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} wlyyry, #{zzcm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} zzcm, #{sfxdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} sfxdt, #{ycxdtcs,jdbcType=CHAR} ycxdtcs, #{csfs,jdbcType=CHAR} csfs, #{cssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} cssj, #{kxxbgy,jdbcType=CHAR} kxxbgy, #{gysj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} gysj, #{aspl,jdbcType=DECIMAL} aspl, #{tgrl,jdbcType=DECIMAL} tgrl, #{lpgl,jdbcType=DECIMAL} lpgl, #{zd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zd, #{yqrssc,jdbcType=CHAR} yqrssc, #{yqrs,jdbcType=CHAR} yqrs, #{rscs,jdbcType=CHAR} rscs, #{zqtyks,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} zqtyks, #{qszqty,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} qszqty, #{rsks,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} rsks, #{rsjs,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} rsjs, #{rshzy,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} rshzy, #{rsyw,jdbcType=CHAR} rsyw, #{rsywjl,jdbcType=CHAR} rsywjl, #{rszt,jdbcType=CHAR} rszt, #{sfxdtqz,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} sfxdtqz, #{bqpgmx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bqpgmx, #{zycs,jdbcType=CHAR} zycs, #{djry,jdbcType=VARCHAR} djry, #{djrymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} djrymc, #{djsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} djsj, #{ddyydmsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ddyydmsj, #{ddfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ddfs, #{wlyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} wlyy from dual) b on (a.xt_seq = b.xt_seq) when matched then update set a.BQPG = b.BQPG, a.SCYLJC = b.SCYLJC, a.WLYYRY = b.WLYYRY, a.SFXDT = b.SFXDT, a.YCXDTCS = b.YCXDTCS, a.CSFS = b.CSFS, a.KXXBGY = b.KXXBGY, a.GYSJ = b.GYSJ, a.ASPL = b.ASPL, a.TGRL = b.TGRL, a.LPGL = b.LPGL, a.ZD = b.ZD, a.YQRSSC = b.YQRSSC, a.YQRS = b.YQRS, a.RSCS = b.RSCS, a.ZQTYKS = b.ZQTYKS, a.QSZQTY = b.QSZQTY, a.RSKS = b.RSKS, a.RSJS = b.RSJS, a.RSHZY = b.RSHZY, a.RSYW = b.RSYW, a.RSYWJL = b.RSYWJL, a.RSZT = b.RSZT, a.SFXDTQZ = b.SFXDTQZ, a.BQPGMX = b.BQPGMX, a.ZYCS = b.ZYCS, a.DDYYDMSJ = b.DDYYDMSJ, a.DDFS = b.DDFS, a.WLYY = b.WLYY when not matched then insert (XT_SEQ, BQPG, SCYLJC, WLYYRY, SFXDT, YCXDTCS, CSFS, KXXBGY, GYSJ, ASPL, TGRL, LPGL, ZD, YQRSSC, YQRS, RSCS, ZQTYKS, QSZQTY, RSKS, RSJS, RSHZY, RSYW, RSYWJL, RSZT, SFXDTQZ, BQPGMX, ZYCS,DJRY,DJRYMC,DJSJ,DDYYDMSJ,DDFS,WLYY) values (AID_PATIENT_XT_SEQ.nextval, b.BQPG, b.SCYLJC, b.WLYYRY, b.SFXDT, b.YCXDTCS, b.CSFS, b.KXXBGY, b.GYSJ, b.ASPL, b.TGRL, b.LPGL, b.ZD, b.YQRSSC, b.YQRS, b.RSCS, b.ZQTYKS, b.QSZQTY, b.RSKS, b.RSJS, b.RSHZY, b.RSYW, b.RSYWJL, b.RSZT, b.SFXDTQZ, b.BQPGMX, b.ZYCS, b.DJRY, b.DJRYMC, b.DJSJ, b.ddyydmsj, b.ddfs, b.wlyy)
mapper.insert: insert into AID_PATIENT_XT (XT_SEQ, BQPG, SCYLJC, WLYYRY, ZZCM, SFXDT, YCXDTCS, CSFS, CSSJ, KXXBGY, GYSJ, ASPL, TGRL, LPGL, ZD, YQRSSC, YQRS, RSCS, ZQTYKS, QSZQTY, RSKS, RSJS, RSHZY, RSYW, RSYWJL, RSZT, SFXDTQZ, BQPGMX, ZYCS,DJRY,DJRYMC,DJSJ, DDYYDMSJ,DDFS,WLYY) values (#{xtSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bqpg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scyljc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{wlyyry,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zzcm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sfxdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ycxdtcs,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{csfs,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{kxxbgy,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{gysj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aspl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tgrl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lpgl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yqrssc,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{yqrs,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rscs,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{zqtyks,jdbcType=DATE}, #{qszqty,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rsks,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rsjs,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rshzy,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rsyw,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rsywjl,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rszt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sfxdtqz,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bqpgmx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zycs,jdbcType=CHAR},#{djry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{djrymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{djsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{ddyydmsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{ddfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{wlyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
